TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_pizza, title = pizza, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/pizza} }

S.FORM: aicu a pizza nu aya mavan a namasan kinaitalian a sinan kinsa a cinapan a tjukutjuku a lumay katua saurig/tjamuni, cis , qaruvaruvang/ramuramuq, ada, ljaceng, vutjulj katua zuma a sinipatjelu a semangua'. maculju a pizza a cinapa i tua nua seitali a sicapacapan (wood-fired oven). a tja siaya uta tua kedri a pizza avan a pizzetta. a tja siaya tua kisancemapa tua pizza avan a pizzaiolo. matjaita a tjukutjukuan a pizza a sinipavay tua caucau i pavelian tua djamay i itali. sika sikan niamadju a siqunu katua draqadraqa . a sangasangasan a sinivecik aicu a takalan a pizza, avan a i pinapuvecikan a linatinan a kemasi kanavalj a qinaljan nua seitali a gaeta i lazio i tua ljaljaqetian tua campania nu i qadjav a caviljan a 900. ka vineqac aicu a pizza i naples. ka pasuvililj aicu a pizza a makeljang tua i matjaliaw a kunian. == kasizuan ==

aico a pizza no aya mavan a namasan kinaitalian a sinan kinsa a cinapan a tjokotjoko a lomay katoa saorig/tjamoni, cis , qarovarovang/ramoramoq, ada, ljaceng, votjolj katoa zoma a sinipatjelo a semangoa'. macoljo a pizza a cinapa i toa noa seitali a sicapacapan (wood-fired oven). a tja siaya ota toa kedri a pizza avan a pizzetta. a tja siaya toa kisancemapa toa pizza avan a pizzaiolo. matjaita a tjokotjokoan a pizza a sinipavay toa caocao i pavelian toa djamay i itali. sika sikan niamadjo a siqono katoa draqadraqa . a sangasangasan a sinivecik aico a takalan a pizza, avan a i pinapovecikan a linatinan a kemasi kanavalj a qinaljan noa seitali a gaeta i lazio i toa ljaljaqetian toa campania no i qadjav a caviljan a 900. ka vineqac aico a pizza i naples. ka pasovililj aico a pizza a makeljang toa i matjaliaw a konian. == kasizoan ==
